Why Oklahoma City Customers Choose Bird Dog Moving

  • Licensed & insured (no hidden fees)
  • On-time arrivals and careful handling
  • Upfront, transparent quotes
  • Local OKC-owned and operated

Bird Dog is the best moving company in OKC for people who want speed without the stress. From packing to placement, we protect your time and your belongings.

How Our Moving Process Works

Plan

Virtual/onsite walkthrough, clear quote, exact move window.

Pack

Materials, labeling, and wrap for furniture and fragile items.

Move

Trained crew, protected pathways, efficient load/unload.

Unpack

Placement by room and final sweep so you're settled fast.

Our process makes hiring local movers in OKC simple from start to finish.

No Hidden Fees, Ever

Get a clear line-item quote before we lift a box. Rates reflect crew size, distance, and any specialty items (pianos, safes). Free walkthroughs and written estimates. Need numbers now? Get your free moving quote in Oklahoma City.

Moving Questions in Oklahoma City, Answered

How much do movers cost in Oklahoma City?

Pricing depends on home size, inventory, and timing. Start with a free moving quote in Oklahoma City and we'll lock in your rate.

Do you offer same-day movers in OKC?

Yes—our same day movers OKC team can help with urgent or last-minute moves.

Do you handle long-distance moves?

Absolutely. See long distance movers in Oklahoma City for planning and transit options.

Frequently Asked Questions

What services do you offer?

We provide a range of moving services including residential and commercial relocations, packing, and storage solutions tailored to meet your needs.

How can I get a quote?

To receive a quote, please fill out our online form with your moving details, or contact us directly via phone or email for personalized assistance.

What areas do you serve?

We serve a wide range of locations across the region, ensuring your move is efficient and hassle-free.

Do you offer packing services?

Yes, we offer professional packing services to ensure your belongings are securely packed and protected during the move.

What should I do if I need to change my moving date?

If you need to change your moving date, please contact us as soon as possible. We will do our best to accommodate your new schedule and ensure a smooth transition.

About Bird Dog Moving: Oklahoma City's Most Trusted Local Movers Since 2018

Moving doesn't have to be stressful. At Bird Dog Moving, we've been helping Oklahoma City families and businesses relocate with confidence for over six years. As a family-owned moving company, we treat your belongings like our own.

Why Oklahoma City Chooses Bird Dog Moving

Local Knowledge That Makes a Difference

We know Oklahoma City like the back of our hand. From navigating downtown parking restrictions to the best times to move through Moore or Edmond, our local expertise saves you time and hassle. We've completed over 2,000 moves across the metro—there's no neighborhood challenge we haven't solved.

Licensed, Insured, and Accountable

Every Bird Dog mover is fully licensed and insured. We're your neighbors, and we stake our reputation on every single move. Our comprehensive coverage protects your belongings from pickup to delivery.

Transparent Pricing, No Surprises

We believe in honest, upfront pricing. Our detailed estimates include all costs—no surprises on moving day. Most customers save 15–20% compared to national chains while getting personalized, local service.

What Sets Us Apart

Family-Owned Values

We answer to our community, not shareholders. When you call, you're talking to local owners who live and work in OKC.

Careful Handling

From heirlooms to new furniture, we use professional-grade packing and proven techniques for safe arrival.

Flexible Scheduling

Evenings, weekends, and short-notice moves to fit your life. Need help fast? We'll make it happen.

Our Moving Services

From small apartment moves to large office relocations, we handle it all—packing, loading, transportation, and unpacking. For businesses, we offer after-hours moves and specialized handling for office equipment. We also provide local delivery for furniture and single-item moves.

Explore Services
